text: Zsuzsa Csala (9 July 1933 - 22 February 2014) was a Hungarian actress. She began her career in 1954 on stage. Csala died after a long illness on 22 February 2014 in her hometown of Budapest. She was aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Budapest Category:Disease-related deaths in Hungary Category:Hungarian movie actors Category:Hungarian stage actors Category:Hungarian television actors
title: Zsuzsa Csala
